name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 2
description:
Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 2 is a fighting game developed by DIMPS. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Atari. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 2 on PlayStation 2 and GameCube.
Hiroshi Matsumoto produced the game. Hiroshi Matsumoto and Takashi Tsukamoto directed the game. Hironobu Inagaki scored the game.
